criterion: Does not include a clear patient identification
Provides accurate information about the possibility of needing more tests
Asks for clarification about the patient's symptoms or medical history
Writes the SOAP note in a clear and concise manner
Does not include any medical jargon or overly technical language
Fails to include a relevant diagnosis or treatment plan
Provides incorrect information about the patient's condition or treatment
Includes a clear and concise summary of the patient's symptoms and medical history
Does not include any unnecessary or redundant information
